com.uofa.adventure_app.activity

Class BrowserActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.uofa.adventure_app.interfaces.AdventureActivity
        • com.uofa.adventure_app.activity.BrowserActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataReturn<Story>

    public class BrowserActivity
extends AdventureActivity
    This class takes in user input and processes it when the user is in the Story Browsing screen. It interacts with the Story class in the model.
    Author:
    Kevin Lafond, Chris Pavlicek
